root.name: Brian Clough's Football Fortunes
root.description: Brian Clough's Football Fortunes is a football management sim for up to five players. As with most football management sims each player has to steer their team through the football season. After the first season the European Cup, Cup-Winners’ Cup and the FIFA Cup are available. The winner is the player that who survives to the end of the game and has the most game points. The amount of game points awarded is based on how the player did in the league and cups and how much money they have left.
